# Ooze (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* | *Demon Lords:* Juiblex, Zuggtmoy |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Power:** You can rebuke or command oozes as an evil cleric rebukes or commands undead. This ability is usable a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

**Ooze Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Grease (Spell)|Grease]]****:** Makes a 10-ft. square or one object slippery.

**2** **[[Web (Spell)|Web]]****:** Fills a 20-ft.-radius spread with sticky spider webs.

**3** **[[Poison]]****:** Your touch deals 1d10 Con damage, repeats in 1 min.

**4** **[[Rusting Grasp (Spell)|Rusting Grasp]]****:** Your touch corrodes iron and alloys.

**5** **[[Oozepuppet (Spell)|Oozepuppet]]****:** You can telekinetically control target ooze.

**6** **[[Transmute Rock to Mud (Spell)|Transmute Rock to Mud]]****:** Transforms two 10-ft. cubes per level.

**7** **[[Slime Wave (Spell)|Slime Wave]]****:** Creates a 15-ft. spread of green slime.

**8** **[[Befoul (Spell)|Befoul]]****:** Turns large amount of water poisonous.

**9** **[[Implosion (Spell)|Implosion]]****:** Kills one creature/round.

**Source:** Fiendish Codex I (WotC), pg. 89
